products.name: Rototiller
products.description: It is used for tilling the soil

products.name: Disc Plough
products.description: It is used for cultivating the soil

products.name: Harrow Plough
products.description: It is used for preparing tilled soil for seed sowing

products.name: Seed Drill
products.description: It is used to make holes in the soil

products.name: Rotavator
products.description: It is used for breaking up the soil

products.name: Subsoiler
products.description: It is used to rip hard grounds to remove compaction lays

products.name: Cultipacker
products.description: It is used to remove air packets and press down small stones, forming a smooth, firm seedbed

products.name: Chisel Plow
products.description: It is used to break up and stir soil a foot or more beneath the surface without turning it

products.name: Bottom Plow
products.description: It is used for breaking up the soil

products.name: Rake
products.description: It is used to collect leaves, hay, grass etc

products.name: Pick
products.description: It is used to pierce or make a hole

products.name: Shovel
products.description: It is used for digging, lifting and moving bulk materials

products.name: Pitchfork
products.description: It is used to lift and pitch loose material such as leaves, hay, straw or leaves

products.name: Hand Cultivator
products.description: It is used to turn the soil

products.name: Trowel
products.description: It is used for digging and smoothing the soil

products.name: Rotatory Dibbler
products.description: It is used for  for dibbling of medium and bold size seeds such as maize, soybean, sorghum, pigeon pea etc

products.name: Seed Cum Fertilizer Drill
products.description: It is used to sow crops like wheat, gram, sorghum, soybean, lentil, pea, sunflower, safflower etc. and drill fertilizer in soil under rainfed condition

products.name: Groundnut Planter
products.description: It is used for for planting groundnut

products.name: Power Tiller, Rice Planter
products.description: It is used for planting rice

products.name: Rice Transplanter
products.description: It is used for transplanting paddy seedlings in puddled soils

products.name: Zero Till Seed Fertilizer Drill
products.description: It is used to sow wheat directly in rice harvested fields without preparing the seedbed

products.name: Raised Bed Planter
products.description: It is used to sow wheat
